translated: is never not suchness.

original: de ni / rtag tu de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ni / rtag tu de bzhin nyid do //
translated: It is always suchness.

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste /
translated: The suchness of the elder Subh≈´ti is also like that.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas /
translated: Therefore, since it is not a different aspect,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gang du'ang skyes pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gang du'ang skyes pa med do //
translated: he is born after the TathƒÅgata, but he is not born anywhere.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin /
translated: Just as the suchness of the TathƒÅgata is not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: is not future,

original: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin /üîΩma 'ongs pa ma yin /üîΩda ltar byung ba ma yin no //üîΩde bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin / ma 'ongs pa ma yin / da ltar byung ba ma yin no // de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin /
translated: Just as the suchness of all dharmas is not past, not future, and not present,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /üîΩda ltar byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin / da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
translated: so also the suchness of the elder Subh≈´ti is not past, not future, and not present.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the elder Subh≈´ti is said to be born after the TathƒÅgata.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: herein, the suchness of the TathƒÅgata should be known as the suchness of equality through the equality of the suchness of the past.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //üîΩma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin @254a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do // ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin @254a *//
translated: The suchness of the past is through the equality of the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.üîΩThe suchness of the future is through the equality of the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.

original: nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the present is through the equality of the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.üîΩThe suchness of the TathƒÅgata is through the equality of the suchness of the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //üîΩda ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the tathƒÅgatas is the same as the suchness of the future.üîΩThe suchness of the present is the same as the suchness of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the tathƒÅgatas is the same as the suchness of the present.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
translated: the suchness of the past, future, and present, and the suchness of the tathƒÅgatas,

original: gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su med de /
translated: are not two,

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //üîΩgzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do // gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: and cannot be divided into two.üîΩThe suchness of form is the suchness of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the tathƒÅgatas is the suchness of form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Likewise, the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the TathƒÅgata is the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
translated: the suchness of form, the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, and the suchness of the TathƒÅgata

original: gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su med de /
translated: are not two,

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not become different.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /üîΩbdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i @254b de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i @254b de bzhin nyid do //
translated: In the same way,üîΩthe suchness of a self is the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the TathƒÅgata is the suchness of a self.

original: de bzhin du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: In the same way, the suchness of the TathƒÅgata is the suchness of the one who knows and the one who sees, up to the suchness of the one who realizes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the one who knows and the one who sees, up to the suchness of the one who realizes is the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /üîΩgnyis su med de /
analyzed: bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni / gnyis su med de /
translated: the suchness of the self, the suchness of the one who knows and the one who sees, up to the suchness of the one who realizes, and the suchness of the TathƒÅgataüîΩare not two

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: and are not divided.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /
translated: the suchness of the perfection of giving, the suchness of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom, and the suchness of the TathƒÅgataüîΩare not two

original: gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su med de /
translated: and are not divided.

original: gnyis su dbyer med do; ;nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /üîΩgnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do; ;nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni / gnyis su med de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of great extent and the suchness of the emptiness of ultimate reality are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the suchness of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited and the suchness of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end are non-dual and indivisible.

original: gnyis su dbyer med do; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /üîΩgnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni / gnyis su med de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-dispersal and the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of all things and the suchness of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics are non-dual and indivisible.

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension and the suchness of the emptiness of non-discernment are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension and the suchness of the emptiness of non-discernment are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness of non-dispersal and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs @255a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs @255a *//
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence and the suchness of the emptiness of all things are non-dual and indivisible.üîΩThe suchness of the emptiness

original: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the TathƒÅgata is the suchness of the perfection of giving, and so on, up to the suchness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the TathƒÅgata is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni /üîΩgnyis su med de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni / gnyis su med de /
translated: the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the TathƒÅgata

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: are not two and are not divided.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: ‚ÄúGods,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: the TathƒÅgata, having relied on this suchness, has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes so //
translated: and has attained the name TathƒÅgata.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na /
translated: When this chapter on suchness was being taught,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te 'gul /üîΩrab tu 'gul /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te 'gul / rab tu 'gul /
translated: it quivered, quivered strongly, and quivered intensely;

original: kun tu rab tu 'gul to //
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'gul to //
translated: it shook, shook strongly, and shook intensely;üîΩit shuddered, shuddered strongly, and shuddered intensely;üîΩit quaked, quaked strongly, and quaked intensely;

original: g-yos / rab tu g-yos /üîΩkun tu rab tu g-yos so //üîΩldeg / rab tu ldeg /üîΩkun tu rab tu ldeg go ;chem chem /
analyzed: g-yos / rab tu g-yos / kun tu rab tu g-yos so // ldeg / rab tu ldeg / kun tu rab tu ldeg go ;chem chem /
translated: it roared, roared strongly, and roared intensely;üîΩit rumbled, rumbled strongly, and rumbled intensely;

original: rab tu chem chem /üîΩkun tu rab tu chem chem mo //
analyzed: rab tu chem chem / kun tu rab tu chem chem mo //
translated: it crashed, crashed strongly, and crashed intensely;

original: 'ur 'ur / rab tu 'ur 'ur /üîΩkun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro //üîΩ'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs /
analyzed: 'ur 'ur / rab tu 'ur 'ur / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro // 'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs /
translated: it trembled, trembled strongly, and trembled intensely;üîΩit trembled all around, trembled all around strongly, and trembled all around intensely;

original: kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so //üîΩshar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o //
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so // shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o //
translated: it quaked all around, quaked all around strongly, and quaked all around intensely;üîΩthe east rose while the west sank,

original: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o //üîΩbyang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o //
analyzed: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o // byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o //
translated: the west rose while the east sank,üîΩthe north rose while the south sank,

original: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o //üîΩmtha' mtho na dbus dma'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o // mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o //
translated: the south rose while the north sank,üîΩthe periphery rose while the center sank,

original: @255b dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o //
analyzed: @255b dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o //
translated: and the center rose while the periphery sank.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis gtor mngon par gtor /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis gtor mngon par gtor /
translated: Then the sons of gods who live in the desire realm and the sons of gods who live in the form realm scattered, rained down, and completely rained down on the Lord and the elder Subh≈´ti divine sandalwood powder.

original: mngon par rab tu gtor nas 'di skad ces /
analyzed: mngon par rab tu gtor nas 'di skad ces /
translated: Having done so, they said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúLord,üîΩit is amazing

original: 'di ltar / gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni /
translated: that this elder Subh≈´ti has been born after the TathƒÅgata through the suchness of the TathƒÅgata.

original: ngo mchar  lags so //üîΩzhes tshig tu brjod do //
analyzed: ngo mchar  lags so // zhes tshig tu brjod do //
translated: ‚ÄúHow amazing!‚ÄùüîΩhe said.üîΩ

original: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the elder Subh≈´ti, having taken up the thread of the conversation of those sons of gods, said this to those sons of gods:

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: ‚ÄúSons of gods,

original: 'di ltar / gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /üîΩgzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /üîΩgzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gnas brtan rab 'byor ni / gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes / gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: it is like this:üîΩThe elder Subh≈´ti has not been born after form;üîΩhe has not been born after anything other than form.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not been born after the suchness of form;

original: gzugs gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: gzugs gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise following anything other than the suchness of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /

original: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so /
translated: It does not arise following anything other than consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

translated: ‚Äú≈öƒÅriputra,

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subh≈´ti said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúLord,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar gnas par bgyi /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar gnas par bgyi /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems la gnas par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, bodhisattva great beings should live with a mind that is impartial toward all beings.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: They should generate a mind that is the same toward all beings.

original: mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //üîΩsems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs @266a *//
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o // sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs @266a *//
translated: They should not generate a mind that is not the same.

original: par bya ste /
analyzed: par bya ste /
translated: They should observe all beings with a mind that is the same toward all beings.

original: mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not observe with a mind that is not the same.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should generate great love and great compassion toward all beings.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: They should observe all beings with a mind of love.

original: brlang pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: brlang pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not observe with a mind of violence.

original: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o //üîΩsems can thams cad la g-yo med par dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o // sems can thams cad la g-yo med par dmigs par bya'o //
translated: One should be free of pride toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should be free of deceit toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should generate the thought of helping all sentient beings.

original: gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not generate the thought of harming them.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should focus on all sentient beings with the thought of helping them.

original: gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not focus on them with the thought of harming them.

original: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should generate the thought of being free of hostility toward all sentient beings.

original: zhe 'gras pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not generate the thought of hostility toward them.

original: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should generate the thought of being free of contempt toward all sentient beings.

original: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not generate the thought of contempt toward them.

original: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should focus on all sentient beings with the thought of being free of contempt.

original: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not focus on them with the thought of contempt.

original: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse the attitude of a mother toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should arouse the attitude of a brother toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should arouse the attitude of a friend toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should arouse the attitude of a relative toward all sentient beings.

original: spun dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: spun dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse the attitude of a kinsman toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems kyis dmigs @266b par bya zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems kyis dmigs @266b par bya zhing /
translated: One should arouse the attitude of a mother toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should arouse the attitude of a friend toward all sentient beings.üîΩOne should arouse the attitude of a relative toward all sentient beings.

original: mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi bar gyi sems kyis dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi bar gyi sems kyis dmigs par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse the attitude of a kinsman toward all sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya /
translated: One should oneself abstain from killing.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya /
translated: One should encourage others to take up the avoidance of killing.

original: srog gcod pa spang ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spang ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should speak in praise of the avoidance of killing.

original: gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should also praise those who have avoided killing.

original: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya /
translated: One should oneself abstain from taking what has not been given.

original: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: One should encourage others to take up the avoidance of taking what has not been given.

original: ma byin par len pa spong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa spong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should praise the avoidance of taking what is not given.

original: gzhan gang dag ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should praise others who avoid taking what is not given, welcoming it.

original: bdag kyang 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag kyang 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spang bar bya /
translated: One should oneself avoid sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: One should cause others to take up the avoidance of sexual misconduct.

original: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should praise the avoidance of sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan gang dag 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: One should praise others who avoid sexual misconduct, welcoming it.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
translated: Thus should the bodhisattva great being stand, if he wishes to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spang bar bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spang bar bya /
translated: In the same way, one should oneself avoid ‚Ä¶ down to ‚Ä¶ wrong views.

original: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to give up wrong views.

original: log par lta ba spong ba'i @267a *//üîΩbsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: log par lta ba spong ba'i @267a *// bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up wrong views.

original: gzhan yang gang dag log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gang dag log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who have given up wrong views, rejoicing in them.

original: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: I will myself enter into the first meditative concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the first meditative concentration.

original: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of entering into the first meditative concentration.

original: gzhan gang dag bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter into the first meditative concentration, rejoicing in them.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: In the same way, I will myself enter into the second meditative concentration, the third meditative concentration, and the fourth meditative concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug pa dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i bar du bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug pa dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i bar du bya ste /
translated: Moreover, one should praise and rejoice in those who enter into meditative absorption up to the fourth concentration.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who wishes to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should abide in that way.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: Moreover, Subh≈´ti, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who wishes to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: bdag gis kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: should himself enter into meditative absorption in loving kindness,

original: gzhan gang dag byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du bya'o //
translated: and should praise and rejoice in others who enter into meditative absorption in loving kindness.

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The same should be done for compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: @267b bdag gis kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: @267b bdag gis kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: I myself should enter into the concentration on the sphere of infinite space.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gang dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gang dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du bya'o //
translated: I should speak in praise of entering into the concentration on the sphere of infinite space, and I should delight in it.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du 'ang de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du 'ang de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I myself should complete the perfection of generosity.

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should encourage others to take up the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of the perfection of generosity.

original: gzhan gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should speak in praise of others who complete the perfection of generosity, and I should delight in it.

original: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I too should complete the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also inspire others to take up the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I should also speak in praise of others who complete the perfection of wisdom, welcoming it.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //üîΩbdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug par bya /üîΩgzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms @268a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o // bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug par bya / gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms @268a *//
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who want to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should live like that.üîΩI should also enter into the meditative stabilization of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also inspire others to take up the meditative stabilization of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: gzhan gang dag nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and I will praise others who are absorbed in the emptiness of internal phenomena, welcoming it.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: In the same way, I will be absorbed in the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to be absorbed in the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: gzhan gang dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and I will praise others who are absorbed in the emptiness of external phenomena, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: I will cultivate the four applications of mindfulness,

original: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: Moreover, one should encourage others to take up the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should praise the applications of mindfulness.

original: gzhan gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should also praise and rejoice in others who cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bya'o //
translated: One should do the same up to the eightfold noble path.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: One should also personally enter into the meditative absorptions of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: gzhan yang stong pa nyid dang / @268b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang stong pa nyid dang / @268b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: One should encourage others to take up the meditative absorptions of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should praise the meditative absorptions of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: gzhan gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those who enter the meditative absorption of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: I will enter the meditative absorption of the eight liberations.

original: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to take up the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the eight liberations.

original: gzhan gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //üîΩbdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o // bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will praise those who enter the meditative absorption of the eight liberations, and I will rejoice in them.üîΩI will perfect the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to take up the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: gzhan gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise others who perfect the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas and rejoice in that.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / @269a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / @269a *//
translated: Similarly, they should themselves perfect the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love,

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: and great compassion.

original: gzhan yang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i bar du yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i bar du yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: They should cause others to take up great love and great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the perfection of great compassion.

original: gzhan gang dag snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //üîΩbdag gis kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o // bdag gis kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: I will also praise the praises of those who perfect great compassion, and I will rejoice in them.üîΩI will also enter into the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination.

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /üîΩrten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will also encourage others to enter into the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination.üîΩI will also praise the praises of those who enter into the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination.

original: gzhan gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I will also praise the praises of those who enter into the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination, and I will rejoice in them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who wishes to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should live like that.

original: bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /
translated: I will fully understand suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba spang bar bya /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba spang bar bya /
translated: abandon its origination,

original: 'gog pa mngon sum du bya /
analyzed: 'gog pa mngon sum du bya /
translated: actualize its cessation,

original: lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: lam bsgom par bya /
translated: and cultivate the path.

original: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba @269b dang / kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / lam bsgom par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba @269b dang / kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / lam bsgom par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will also encourage others to fully understand suffering, abandon its origination, actualize its cessation, and cultivate the path.

original: sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the full understanding of suffering and the cultivation of the path.

original: gzhan gang dag sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa dang / lam sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa dang / lam sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those who know suffering, abandon the origin, manifest the cessation, and cultivate the path, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: I will manifest the knowledge that actualizes the result of stream enterer.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /üîΩgzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya / gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: But I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will encourage others to take up the knowledge that actualizes the result of stream enterer.

original: bdag gis kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: I will manifest the knowledge that actualizes the result of once-returner.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
translated: But I will not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: ‚ÄúI will manifest the knowledge of the result of once-returner,

original: bdag gis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: and I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of non-returner,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
translated: but I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of non-returner,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of arhatship,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of arhatship,

original: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du @270a *//üîΩgzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du @270a *// gzhug par bya /
translated: and I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of pratyekabuddhahood,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of pratyekabuddhahood,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of buddhahood,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of buddhahood,

original: bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: and I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of giving,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection of giving,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of ethics,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection of ethics,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of patience,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
translated: but I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection of patience,

original: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu shes pa mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: and I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of effort,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection of effort,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of meditation,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection of meditation,üîΩand I will also generate the knowledge that manifests the result of the perfection of wisdom,üîΩbut I will not actualize the very limit of reality.üîΩI will also encourage others to manifest the knowledge of the result of the perfection

original: bdag gis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: I too should give rise to the knowledge that directly perceives the knowledge of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du'ang mi bya /
translated: I should not even directly perceive the knowledge of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba la 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba la 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also encourage others to directly perceive the knowledge of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya /
translated: I should also enter into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also encourage others to uphold the entry into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of the entry into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I should also speak in praise of other bodhisattvas who enter into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas and rejoice in that.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas de ltar gnas par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who wishes to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should live like that.

original: bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par @270b bya; gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par @270b bya; gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should bring beings to maturity. I should encourage others to bring beings to maturity.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of bringing beings to maturity.

original: gzhan gang dag sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should speak in praise of others bringing beings to maturity as well, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I should purify a buddhafield.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should encourage others to purify a buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of purifying a buddhafield.

original: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will also praise the abilities of those who purify a buddhafield, and I will rejoice in those abilities.

original: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya /
translated: I will also generate the superknowledges of a bodhisattva.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will also encourage others to generate the superknowledges of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will also praise the generation of the superknowledges of a bodhisattva.

original: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will also praise those who generate the superknowledges of a bodhisattva, and I will rejoice in those abilities.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya /
translated: I will also generate the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi @271a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi @271a *//
translated: I will also encourage others to generate the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.üîΩI will also praise the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should praise the knowledge of the buddhas.

original: gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should also praise and rejoice in the knowledge of the buddhas that others generate.

original: bdag gis kyang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya /
translated: One should also abandon all propensities, connections, and afflictions.

original: gzhan yang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /

analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs lnga'i bar du rtag tu rgyun mi chad par phyi bzhin 'brang ste / de la mi rnams sam /

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub yid la byed pa las de'i sems rnam par g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te /

original: @289a *// de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas shing /

analyzed: chos 'dod pa nyid yin gyi /

original: chos mi 'dod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chos mi 'dod pa nyid ma yin no //

translated: They consider the blessed buddhas and the bodhisattva great beings to be spiritual friends.

original: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'jin  du 'jug go /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'jin  du 'jug go /
translated: They cause the sons of noble family and the daughters of noble family who are followers of the vehicle of the hearers and the vehicle of the solitary buddhas to genuinely take up unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: 'dzud de; 'dul lo //
